title: Nicole Byer: A Joke about the Pandemic
description: Nicole Byer jokes about the pandemic in her Netflix special, "Big Beautiful Weirdo" only on Netflix. Don't forget to grab your tickets to Netflix is a Joke: The Festival running from April 29-May 8th 2022.  Tickets go on sale Friday, December 10th at NetflixisaJokeFest.com.
author: podcasts@netflix.com (Nicole Byer, Big Beautiful Weirdo)
